attributes.review: I downloaded this app to widen my political views and to my surprise, THIS APP IS ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE. Not worth downloading, this Cheeto-ass looking baby created the worst app ever, what a clown 🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡

attributes.review: The app is buggy and it ok but the big issue is trumps name is on it so it’s a big fat one star for me✌🏾

attributes.review: i had gotten this fine app to be educated, but it’s all fake, the app, my phone, i’m not even real, are any of us really, real? does it even matter? maybe one day we will wake up and escape.
